item.title: CVE-2018-16858|2024-08-05T10:32:54.146Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- libreoffice
item.description: It was found that libreoffice before versions 6.0.7 and 6.1.3 was vulnerable to a directory traversal attack which could be used to execute arbitrary macros bundled with a document. An attacker could craft a document, which when opened by LibreOffice, would execute a Python method from a script in any arbitrary file system location, specified relative to the LibreOffice install location.
